title: Space Travel
lyrics:
Slow sigan-i meomchun deus-i
Falling nege ppajyeodeul-eoga
Ujuui byeoldeulcheoleom
Glowing geudaega gyesog bichna

Cheoncheonhi jiguga dol-ayo

Junglyeog wileul geol-eumyeo

Maemdol-a maemdol-a



Bich-ui sogdolo nal-agayo

Nae son-eul kkwag jab-ayo

We can love

We can love



Don’t say yeogil tteonayo

Let it go, Let it be

Dance achim-i wado

Uju jeopyeon-eseo ulin

You ＆ Me

Floating in the space of time

As you and I LOVE LOVE LOVE



Stop boinayo

Banjjaggeolineun Shooting Stars



Go ttalagayo

Sigan-eun ajig neomu manh-a



Cheoncheonhi taeyang-i dol-ayo

Uju wileul geol-eumyeo

Maemdol-a maemdol-a



Bich-ui sogdolo nal-agayo

Nae son-eul kkwag jab-ayo

We can love

We can love



Don’t say yeogil tteonayo

Let it go, Let it be

Dance achim-i wado

Uju jeopyeon-eseo ulin

You ＆ Me

Floating in the Space of time

As you and I LOVE LOVE LOVE



Don’t say yeogil tteonayo

Let it go, Let it be

Dance achim-i wado

Uju jeopyeon-eseo ulin

You ＆ Me

Floating in the Space of time

As you and I LOVE LOVE LOVE
